properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where (RegistryKey contains "\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Office" and RegistryKey contains "\\Security\\ProtectedView") and ((RegistryValueData =~ "DWORD (0x00000000)" and (RegistryKey endswith "\\enabledatabasefileprotectedview" or RegistryKey endswith "\\enableforeigntextfileprotectedview")) or (RegistryValueData =~ "DWORD (0x00000001)" and (RegistryKey endswith "\\DisableAttachementsInPV" or RegistryKey endswith "\\DisableInternetFilesInPV" or RegistryKey endswith "\\DisableIntranetCheck" or RegistryKey endswith "\\DisableUnsafeLocationsInPV")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects changes to Microsoft Office protected view registry keys with which the attacker disables this feature.
